author: aidan
msg: Added sleep to verify script to avoid startup races.
Fix problem with verify script in ../../bin.
Fixed race condition in the examples: when a listener program prints
its "ready" message, the commands it has sent to the broker may not yet
be complete. This results in sporadic lost messages if the producer is
- Added Session::sync(), wait till all commands to date have completed.
- Call sync() before printing "ready" in listener example programs
STL-style intrsive linked lists, single (ISList) and double (IList)
sys::RefCountedMap - reference-counted weak map of reference-counted objects.
Ensures objects are atomically deleted and removed from the map.
added init after broker shutdown and changed receiveNowait to receive(1000)
Added non-optional enum { SYNC, ASYNC }  parameter to newSession.
Update examples with ASYNC mode to newSession
Disabled RefCountedMap test - failing with valgrind error.
RefCountedMap is not yet in use anywhere, will fix before I use it.
- all fixed-size built-in types tested and working
- all vbin & str types implemented, tests disabled need to fix encoding.
The following types remain to be implemented:
byte-ranges       2 byte ranges within a 64-bit payload
map          0xa8 4 a mapping of keys to typed values
list         0xa9 4 a series of consecutive type-value pairs
array        0xaa 4 a defined length collection of values of a single type
struct32     0xab 4 a coded struct with a 32-bit size
added flag for tagging header without a payload
changed for notifying message arrival when the header does not have a payload
changed for creating durable queue for a durable subscriber
changed for runing only with an 0.8 broker (this is testing 0.8 connection)
added consumer2.close as messages may be delivered to this not used consumer
added message releasing when messag listener is set
* marked preview spec as 99-0 to distinguish it from 0-10 (which will now be used for the final version)
* modified python client to treat 99-0 as 0-10 for now
* modified broker to have two paths for the two different versions: 99-0 uses PreviewConnection, PreviewConnectionHandler
and PreviewSessionHandler which are straight copy & pastes of the Connection, ConnectionHandler and SessionHandler now
associated with 0-10 (so we can migrate the 0-10 path to the final spec without affecting clients working with the preview
modified test harness to clean up data dir when broker crashes
combined test cases and eliminated race condition
Fixes to prevent problems with async store when queue is deleted before all messages are completed or dequeued
Extended amqpgen.rb to cover 0-10 final model.

author: nick
msg: Bug #44471 - Crystal Reports generates files with short StyleRecords, which isn't allowed in the spec. Work around this

author: jorton
msg: Re-implement the SSL session cache abstraction using a vtable; first
step towards use of the ap_provider interface:
Replace all the ssl_scache_* prototypes with provider vtable objects.
ssl_ext_status_hook): Use callbacks from vtable rather than ifdef
Only install the OpenSSL callbacks if a vtable is configured.
implementations static, and add vtable definition.
* modules/ssl_scache_shmcb.c: Likewise; also move the init
* modules/ssl_scache_dbm.c: Likewise; also (temporarily) use a local

author: mcculls
msg: Update docs with latest online content
